column4: Is there any way to refresh a floppy drive rather than remounting it?
I'm about to install Sun Java JRE. Should I download the rpm file or self-extracting file?
should I download rpm or self-extracting file??
is there any reason you need to, you should probably use the repositories
yes, to bypass the latest protection (not only css) while shrinking the dvd using k9copy.
kind of like the linux equivelent of "anydvd"
well I use xdvdshrink. It has never failed me even on commercial dvds
does it remove dvd regions and do I update each week?
it rips the thing into an mpg and then creates a dvd from that. So I guess you could say it removes dvd regions. So long as it can rip it, you can do whatever you want.
so it could compress DVD9 into DVD5?
yeah, that is what it does, "shrink"
thx, but I'm having trouble installing it. I could not find good directions online.
you get the .tar.gz, unzip and run the install.sh script
it will tell you what dependencies you are missing
